task.task-name: Setup Parent POM with Dependency Management
task.description: Configure parent POM with comprehensive dependency management, plugin management, and properties. This centralizes version management for all modules.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: All dependency versions defined in dependencyManagement section
Plugin versions and configuration in pluginManagement section
Properties defined for all version numbers
Spring Boot BOM imported for test app dependencies
JUnit BOM imported for testing dependencies
Child modules can reference dependencies without version numbers

implementation-notes.note: Key dependencies to manage: - chrome-devtools-java-client (com.github.kklisura.cdt:cdt-java-client) - slf4j-api - commons-io - JUnit 5 (BOM) - Mockito - AssertJ - Testcontainers - Spring Boot (BOM)

Key plugins to configure: - maven-compiler-plugin (Java 17) - maven-surefire-plugin (unit tests) - maven-failsafe-plugin (integration tests) - jacoco-maven-plugin (code coverage) - maven-source-plugin - maven-javadoc-plugin
